Class CSCD211Lab1Methods

  • public class CSCD211Lab1Methods
extends java.lang.Object
    The methods class for Lab 1
    NOTE:
    All parameters must be passed as final. Also you don't have to write the DVC you get it automatically

    • Method Detail

      • fillTeamsArray

        public static Team[] fillTeamsArray(java.util.Scanner kb,
                                    int linesPer)
                             throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        The fillTeamsArray method creates an array of the number of teams in the file and then fills that array with individual teams
        Parameters:
        kb - Representing the Scanner object
        linesPer - Representing the number of lines in the file that encompass a single team
        Returns:
        Team [] Representing an array of filled team objects
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if kb is null or linesPer <= 0
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - Done automatically by the Scanner class you don't need to do anything other than put throws FileNotFoundException on the method header
        NOTE:
        This method will call the private method readPlayers - the file object passed will be for each team

      • readPlayers

        private static Player[] readPlayers(java.io.File inf,
                                    int linesPer)
                             throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        The readPlayers method creates an array of the number of players in the file and then fills that array with individual players
        Parameters:
        inf - Representing the open File
        linesPer - Representing the number of lines in the file that encompass a single player
        Returns:
        Player [] Representing an array of filled players
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if inf is null or linesPer <= 0
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - Done automatically by the Scanner class you don't need to do anything other than put throws FileNotFoundException on the method header

      • determinePosition

        private static Position determinePosition(java.lang.String str)
        The private method determinePosition determines the appropriate enumerated type for Position
        Parameters:
        str - Representing the string to be converted to the enumerated type
        Returns:
        Position Representing the string converted to the enumerated type Position
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if str is null or isEmpty or str does not represent a value in the enumerated type Position
        NOTE:
        valueOf already throws IllegalArgumentException if the string does not represent a position

      • menu

        public static int menu(java.util.Scanner kb)
        The menu method offers the following menu choices. The method must ensure the value is within range
        1. Print all Teams to the screen
        2. Print all Teams to the User Specified file
        3. Sort the Teams by ìNatural Orderî (Hint: compareTo)
        4. Sort the by Team Country Name (Hint: Comparator)
        5. Sort each Team's Players by Number (Hint: Player compareTo)
        6. Sort each Team's Players by Position (Hint: Comparator)
        7. Print a entire team and only that team to a user specified file
        8. Print the players for an entire team and only that team to the screen
        9. Quit
        Parameters:
        kb - Representing the Scanner object to the keyboard
        Returns:
        int Representing the menu choice
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the Scanner is null

      • printArray

        public static void printArray(java.io.PrintStream output,
                              java.lang.Comparable[] array)
        The printArray method prints the array to the screen after the object is printed a carriage return is printed
        Parameters:
        output - Reresenting the Screen or the File
        array - Representing the array of type Comparable
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if output is null or the array is null or the array length is <=0
